subject: Cannot login to account
description: I've been locked out of my account after 3 failed login attempts. Password reset link not working.

subject: App crashes on startup
description: The application crashes immediately upon launch on my Android device. Error message shows memory allocation failure.

subject: Billing inquiry
description: Why was I charged twice this month? My credit card shows two identical charges on the same day.

subject: Feature request dark mode
description: It would be nice to have a dark mode option in the settings. Many users are requesting this feature.

subject: Production system down
description: CRITICAL: Our production server is completely offline. All customers unable to access the service.

subject: 2FA setup issue
description: I cannot enable two-factor authentication on my account. The setup keeps failing at step 2.

subject: Payment declined
description: My credit card payment was declined but no error message was provided. What happened?

subject: Bug in export feature
description: The CSV export function produces corrupted files that cannot be opened. This has been a recurring issue.

subject: Enhancement suggestion
description: Could you add bulk user management capabilities? Currently it's very time-consuming.

subject: Account locked after security breach
description: My account has been locked due to suspected unauthorized access. How can I regain access?

subject: API documentation outdated
description: The API reference in your documentation is incorrect and doesn't match the actual endpoints.

subject: Refund request
description: I want to request a full refund for my last subscription payment. Service was not as expected.

subject: Performance issue
description: The application is extremely slow when loading large datasets. Takes 5+ minutes for basic operations.

subject: Password reset not working
description: I clicked reset password but never received the email confirmation link.

subject: Feature request scheduling
description: Could you add appointment scheduling to the calendar module?

subject: SECURITY: SQL injection vulnerability
description: We found a potential SQL injection vulnerability in the user search endpoint.

subject: Invoice discrepancy
description: The invoice shows different charges than what I was quoted. Please clarify the billing.

subject: Mobile app crashes
description: The iOS app keeps crashing when switching between tabs. Very frustrating experience.

subject: Integration request
description: Can you integrate with Salesforce CRM? Many enterprise customers would benefit.

subject: Account access restored
description: Thank you for restoring my account access. Everything is working now.

subject: Cannot upload files
description: File upload feature returns 'file too large' error even for small PDFs.

subject: Subscription cancellation
description: I want to cancel my subscription immediately. How do I proceed?

subject: Defect in reporting module
description: The monthly report generation fails silently without any error notification.

subject: UI improvement suggestion
description: The navigation menu could be more intuitive. Users often get confused.

subject: Account locked critical
description: I cannot access my account. This is blocking critical business operations.

subject: Email notifications broken
description: I'm not receiving email notifications despite enabling them in settings.

subject: Discount code not working
description: The promotional code provided isn't being accepted at checkout.

subject: Data export issue
description: Unable to export my account data. Error message mentions database connection timeout.

subject: Feature enhancement
description: Add the ability to save filter preferences for recurring searches.

subject: Critical bug urgent
description: The bulk import feature is corrupting existing data. URGENT: Production is impacted.

subject: 2FA disabled mysteriously
description: Someone disabled my two-factor authentication without my authorization.

subject: Refund for defective service
description: The feature I paid for isn't working as described. Request full refund.

subject: API rate limiting issue
description: Our integration keeps hitting rate limits unexpectedly. Need guidance.

subject: Can't reset password
description: The password reset process appears broken. No reset link received.

subject: Enhancement request tagging
description: Please add ability to tag tickets for better organization.

subject: Production outage blocking
description: The system is completely down. This is blocking all operations.

subject: Email verification failed
description: Cannot complete email verification for new account creation.

subject: Payment stuck pending
description: My payment has been pending for 3 days. When will it process?

subject: Bug report reproduction steps
description: Click login → enter password → submit → application freezes indefinitely.

subject: Feature request customization
description: Allow custom themes and branding options for enterprise customers.

subject: Session timeout too aggressive
description: I get logged out after just 5 minutes of inactivity. Too short.

subject: Account recovery blocked
description: I cannot verify my identity to recover my locked account.

subject: Bug import failing
description: CSV import process fails silently without error reporting.

subject: Enhancement mobile first
description: The mobile experience needs significant improvement.

subject: Critical security breach
description: Unauthorized access detected on my account. Immediate action needed.

subject: Cannot login anymore
description: After update yesterday I cannot login. Says credentials invalid.

subject: Invoice formatting issue
description: PDF invoices have formatting problems making them hard to read.

subject: Feature suggestion collaboration
description: Add real-time collaboration features for team projects.

description: Application performance has gotten much worse over the last week.
